TopicTitle: Does anyone watched HBO mini series "From the Earth to the moon"

Articles.Content:
the series is really cool.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u1ssw5aJyrk

I remember watching them all as a kid

I just recently downloaded them, and in the process of watching them again... It's amazing how many things had to be created from scratch just for one rocket.... Wish we had that kind of space program again...
YES! My Godfather gave it to me on DVD and loved it! I've watched the entire series multiple times, and when I need inspiration for KSP I watch it again!

YES! I got the tapes on VHS back in 2000, about the same time I discovered an old copy of Buzz Aldrin's Race into space and Liftoff! Great stuff and well made. Lots of interesting details, something pretty much everyone should watch.
